ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Hunting at 25
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [cut] ... Or what? Well, I was faced with the same problem recently. Made a trip back to mainland at 28 (been in Lake 23 - 28). From memories of my wizzie,
ygData.messageBody:
--- Dan's path <danspath@...> wrote:
> Here is a question then. I've been groving from 20
> to 25 in the lake of ill omen, easy exp, I only die
> now when...well, I haven't died in quiet a while!
> The down side is...bored

[cut]

> Should I stay in Castle Mistmoore? Or go else where?
Or what?

Well, I was faced with the same problem recently. Made
a trip back to mainland at 28 (been in Lake 23 - 28).
From memories of my wizzie, I thought MM, Unrest, and
CT would be great hunting grounds. Sadly, it's hard to
actually find groups as there are relatively few
players in their 20's in these dungeons nowadays. They
mostly seem to have 30+ at this point. I don't know
where all the 20's went, probably Lake and Karanas.
You certainly CAN get a group, and then it's a blast,
but it can also mean wait for others of your level to
show up. Esp. if the one group there has an enchanter
already :(
So I am back in Lake to get 29, and then off to
Dalnir, and Nurga/Droga next. At least that's the
plan. Maybe back to CT (haven't played much there
before) in low 30's. Mistmoore is train central, and
as such it's hard to get steady experience due to
frequent zoning and deaths. But give it a shot :)

Treana
DE 28 Enchantress
Quellious
